description: A young woman died near the White Oak Inn. Now, her spirit is roaming around, and an employee is receiving strange letters. What dark secrets wait to be found? The clock is ticking and you, as Alex Hill, must uncover the truth before it’s too late.

title: FRAMEWORK: Found Footage
description: Through the lens of VHS camera, you are given the task of unraveling the twisted framework of seemingly never-ending liminal spaces, also known as the backrooms. Explore unique narrative driven themes of solitude, mystery, and horror.

title: DOLL EYE: CHAPTER TWO
description: DOLL EYE: CHAPTER TWO is the second part of a dialogue-based, story-driven psychological horror game made in RPG Maker MZ.

title: IRIDESCENT
description: Take to the skies in this vibrant eldritch roguelike as you blast away foes as a moth! Fell colossal creatures, collect items, and trade with cats in this colorful explosion of a game.

title: Time is Life
description: Explore Islands and the ocean in a Singleplayer or a Coop adventure. Relaxing gameplay, music and hundreds of unique activities to do. Whether you are an Explorer of the unknown, a Farmer that wants to tend to thousand of crops or someone who enjoys combat through boss battles. This game is for you.

title: Haruka Ao no Hanayome ni
description: 《献给蔚蓝之海的新娘》是由日本美少女游戏知名品牌Lump of Sugar（方糖社）于2023年最新发售的作品。本作由人气原画师萌木原文武担当人物设计与原画，由业内多位剧本家携手担当剧本；结成惠乃香、风花真白等知名声优领衔出演游戏女主角。片头主题曲《Eternity Blue》由知名歌姬Kicco献唱。

title: Cthulhu Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot. Unfortunately, it's a cursed hellscape seeped in eldritch dread. Harvest demonic plants. Find the Cooking Book of The Dead. Sacrifice your friends. Or just grow carrots. Cthulhu can wait, he has always been waiting.

title: Mod Mage Mike
